metadata.title: Set 'aaa accounting' to log all privileged use commands using 'commands 15'

metadata.title: Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 min on 'ip http'

global_test.comment: Set 'aaa accounting' to log all privileged use commands using 'command 15'
Exec time out on ip http
Set maximimum value of 3 for 'ip ssh authentication-retries'
Set 'ip tftp source-interface' to the Loopback Interface

section_test.comment: Set 'transport input ssh' for 'line vty' connections
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes for 'line aux 0'
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes 'line console 0'
Set 'exec-timeout' to less than or equal to 10 minutes 'line vty'
